PCY-GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY.name: pcy-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admins
statements: allow group GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY to manage sddcs in compartment CMP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-KEY
allow group GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY to manage instances in compartment CMP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-KEY
allow group GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY to manage vcns in compartment CMP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-KEY
allow group GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY to use subnets in compartment CMP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-KEY
allow group GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY to use vnics in compartment CMP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-KEY
allow group GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY to use vlans in compartment CMP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-KEY
allow group GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY to use private-ips in compartment CMP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-KEY
allow group GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY to inspect security-lists in compartment CMP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-KEY
allow group GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY to use network-security-groups in compartment CMP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-KEY
